import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Hi, I'm Shreeya Kantamsetty

Computer Science Student at UNC Chapel Hill

About Me

Product Developer

Software Engineer

Web Developer

Hello, I'm Shreeya, a second-year undergraduate at UNC Chapel Hill pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science with double minors in Statistics and Media and Journalism. My passion lies in web and app development, particularly exploring the intersection of web development and machine learning, as well as text and data mining. As the president and founder of my school's sorority for females in computer science and engineering fields, I aim to foster a supportive community. Outside of school, I enjoy reading, watching movies, and meeting new people.

Skills

Web Frameworks
